histore.document.csv.base module¶

Collection of helper classes to read data frames from CSV files.

class histore.document.csv.base.CSVFile(filename: str, header: Optional[List[Union[str, histore.document.schema.Column]]] = None, delim: Optional[str] = None, compressed: Optional[bool] = None, quotechar: Optional[str] = '"', encoding: Optional[str] = None, none_is: Optional[str] = None, skip_lines: Optional[int] = None, delete_on_close: Optional[bool] = False)¶

Bases: histore.document.external.ExternalDocument

Read and write documents that are stored as CSV files.

open() → histore.document.csv.base.CSVIterator¶

Get a row iterator for the associated CSV file.

Returns

Return type

histore.document.csv.base.CSVIterator

sorted(keys: List[int], buffersize: Optional[float] = None) → histore.document.base.Document¶

Sort the document rows based on the values in the key columns.

Key columns are specified by their index position. Returns a new document.

Parameters

  • keys (list of int) – Index position of sort columns.

  • buffersize (float, default=None) – Maximum size (in bytes) of file blocks that are kept in main-memory.

Returns

Return type

histore.document.base.Document

writer() → histore.document.csv.writer.CSVWriter¶

Get a CSV writer for the associated CSV file.

Returns

Return type

histore.document.csv.base.CSVWriter

class histore.document.csv.base.CSVIterator(filename: str, delim: Optional[str] = None, compressed: Optional[bool] = None, quotechar: Optional[str] = '"', encoding: Optional[str] = None, none_is: Optional[str] = None, skip_header: Optional[bool] = False)¶

Bases: histore.document.base.DocumentIterator

Document iterator for CSV documents.

close()¶

Close the associated Json reader.

has_next() → bool¶

Test if the iterator has more rows to read.

Returns

Return type

bool

next() → Tuple[int, Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime, Tuple[Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime], …]], List[Union[int, float, str, datetime.datetime]]]¶

Read the next row in the document.

Returns the row position, row index and the list of cell values for each of the document columns. Raises a StopIteration error if an attempt is made to read past the end of the document.

Returns

Return type

tuple of int, histore.document.base.RowIndex, histore.document.base.DataRow
